jobs_results.title: Android Developer - Development - Openbank (Openhub Mexico)
jobs_results.description:
Android Developer - Development - Openbank (Openhub Mexico)

Apply posted on Posted Yesterday job requisition id Req1332248

Open Digital Services is the software development company of Santander Group powering the next generation of banks by creating innovative banking products and implementing them in collaboration with Santander Group Affiliates.

Santander Group is one of the world's largest financial institutions and the Eurozone's leader. We're committed to being the best Digital Bank with Branches in the industry.

Our mission at ODS is to design and support an advanced digital and omnichannel platform, ensuring the best customer experience using cutting-edge technology. Openbank, our flagship partner, is where we develop our most advanced concepts first.

We are launching operations in Mexico where we partner with Openbank Mexico in its launch in the market, as well as Santander Mexico in the continuous innovation in technology products and channels.

Join us to tackle exciting tech challenges in an agile environment, benefiting from learning, growth, and local and international career opportunities in a modern, diverse setting.

Mission and Responsibilities:

We want to take our customers' digital experience to a new level and you will help us innovate in digital product development in banking.

Responsibilities:
• You will be responsible for Android developments, helping to add value to Openbank Apps, as part of a multidisciplinary team of professionals.
• You will bring your knowledge and experience to the team, proposing ideas for continuous improvement.
• You will participate in code review and contribute to improve common practices.
• You will be responsible for your own proofs of concept to add value to the product.

To be successful in the role you must have:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or other related field or equivalent work experience.
• 5+ years of experience in software development.
• Experience and deep knowledge of Java, Android SDK, and Kotlin.
• Experience with REST and SOAP integrations.
• In-depth knowledge of development patterns.
• Advanced knowledge of mobile application performance optimization.
• Experience working with design teams to optimize the final customer experience.
• Knowledge of agile methodology, Scrum, and Kanban.
• Passion for technology and start-up methodology.
• Ability to learn quickly, creativity, and initiative.
• Ability to make autonomous decisions.
• Results-oriented.
• Team player.
• Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.

What do we offer?
• Immediate incorporation to a dynamic and agile company with a growth and expansion project.
• Working in start-up mode with the support of Grupo Santander.
• Competitive remuneration and attractive benefits package.
• Possibility of growth within the company and the Group.
• Collaboration in international projects and possibility of contact with different countries.
• Excellent work environment, social clubs, and frequent events.

Would you like to grow with us? Join our team!

Openbank is an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered as equal without paying attention to gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, age, political orientation, union membership nor disability status.

We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build.

If you´re not currently living in Madrid or Valencia and you are open to relocate, we would still love to consider your application.
#J-18808-Ljbffr

jobs_results.title: Android Developer: Leading Digital Innovation
jobs_results.description:
• *Company Overview**

Meteors LLC is a pioneering force in digital innovation, pushing the boundaries of interactive display solutions and user-centric experiences.

We're committed to fostering an environment that values creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning, offering our team members meaningful opportunities to contribute to cutting-edge digital solutions.
• *About the Role**

The Lead Android Developer position plays a pivotal role in shaping the next generation of Android applications for Meteors' clients.

This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams to create robust, responsive, and high-quality applications that meet our company's standards.

As a developer in this position, you will play a key role in building features from scratch, refining existing components, and ensuring each app delivers an exceptional user experience.
• *Responsibilities**
• Work closely with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
• Contribute to designing client-side and server-side architecture.
• Brew visually appealing front-end applications through meticulous attention to detail.
• Reuse components to maintain clear code.
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
• Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency.
• Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software.
• Create security and data protection settings.
• Build features and applications with a responsive design.
• Document technical processes.
• Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to improve software.
• Provide insights to build robust software solutions.
• *Requirements**
• Strong knowledge of Android SDK, various Android versions, and handling different screen sizes.
• Understanding of Android Porting and Build process.
• A minimum of 5 years of experience in native apps development.
• Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
• Design, develop, and maintain efficient Android Apps using Android SDK, Java, Kotlin, Jetpack components, SQLite Database, MVVM Architecture.
• Manage the full technical life-cycle of Android applications during each development phase, including functional technical design, implementation, testing, deployment, and maintenance.
• Excellent English verbal and written language proficiency (C1-C2 in CEFR Scale).
• Access to a quiet work area at home with reliable internet (50 Mbps or more).
• *Benefits**
• A competitive salary range of $4,000 - $6,000 per month, depending on experience and location.
• Full-time contractor position.
• Location: Remote work from home in Chile.
• Schedule: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM.
• *Recruiting Process**

The recruitment process includes:
• Application/Screening: A short questionnaire and psychometric evaluation to assess your fit.
• Skills Assessment: Completing exercises and/or projects designed to recreate the work tasks.
• Skills Assessment Interview: A conversation to test skills, learn about previous experiences, and evaluate culture fit.
• Hiring Manager Final Interview: A conversation to get to know you better and set expectations.

jobs_results.title: Ios and android developer
jobs_results.description:
En World Wide Mobility buscamos developers para iOS y Android para integrar en nuestra plantilla, con trabajo 100% remoto, contrato indefinido desde el primer día más prima anual.

Somos una empresa joven, dinámica, flexible y multicultural en donde apostamos por el crecimiento personal y profesional de nuestro equipo. Estamos constantemente en búsqueda de ideas innovadoras que tengan el potencial de cambiar el futuro de la movilidad generando un impacto positivo en la sociedad.

World Wide Mobility suministra tecnología (hardware y software) para fabricantes de automóviles como BMW, Hyundai, Toyota, Hispano Suiza, empresas de alquiler de vehículos como Avis, Centauro Rent a Car, importadores de vehículos como Salvador Caetano (Mayor importador en Portugal), AMAG (Mayor importador en Suiza), Domingo Alonso (Mayor importador en Islas Canarias) y compañías de sharing, entre otras.

Uno de nuestros éxitos más recientes es el sistema de control desarrollado para el coche de lujo Hispano Suiza Carmen, a través de un Hardware y Software que permite controlar desde el smartphone o el smartwatch el coche de lujo Hispano Suiza Carmen, presentado en el Salón de Ginebra 2019. El vehículo, un biplaza eléctrico deportivo que supera los 1.000 CV y del que sólo se fabricarán 19 unidades, tiene un precio de 1,5 millones de euros.

Requisitos mínimos para el perfil Android:
• Kotlin, C, C++
• API Rest
• Conocimientos de patrones de diseño, SOLID, MVVM.
• Unit testing
• GIT, control de versiones con Github
• CI/CD
• Optimización de A/B Testing
• Se valorará conocimientos de integración Bluetooth.

Requisitos mínimos para el perfil iOS:
• Swift, SwiftUI
• API Rest
• Conocimiento patrones de diseño, arquitectura MVC/MVVM y SOLID.
• Unit testing
• GIT, control de versiones con Github
• CI/CD
• Optimización A/B Testing
• CoreBluetooth
• SwiftLint

Funciones:
• Desarrollar, implementar, probar y lanzar las aplicaciones en los markets correspondientes.
• Revisar estándares de calidad, optimizar rendimiento y corregir errores.
• Formar parte de un equipo sólido y dinámico, trabajando con metodologías ágiles.

Ofrecemos:
• Ambiente distendido,
• Teletrabajo 100%
• Contrato indefinido
• Estabilidad
• 5 días de vacaciones adicionales.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android Developer FullRemote ( Exp. Compose)
jobs_results.description:
¿De qué va la empresa en la que trabajarás?

Somos una empresa especializada en transformación digital y comprometida con las personas. Nuestro enfoque se centra en impulsar la aceleración digital tecnológica de la sociedad a través de las apps (mobile, web & IA) y la captación de talento IT.
Durante estos años, nuestros +100 empleados han trabajado con centenares clientes en +3.000 soluciones, ofreciendo una perspectiva holística en la interpretación del reto que implica la transformación digital de sus organizaciones.

¿En qué creemos?

Nos basamos en cuatro valores fundamentales:
• Innovación, ofreciendo soluciones innovadoras de una manera profesional y rentable con un valor diferencial: el conocimiento experto en toda la cadena de valor.
• Compromiso ya que llevamos como propios los objetivos de la organización y superamos cualquier obstáculo para lograrlos.
• Proactividad, proveyendo y realizando acciones para mejorar sus servicios y calidad.
• Trabajo en equipo, contando con un equipo motivado y multidisciplinar que trabaja en perfecta coordinación para lograr los objetivos comunes.

Nos gustaría que fueras un compañero con:
• Muy buen conocimiento de Kotlin y de Java.
• Conocimiento profundo del SDK de Android y las principales herramientas y librerías.
• Conocimiento en inyección de dependencias, persisencia de datos, carga de imágenes y llamadas a red.
• Experiencia con REST APIs y JSON Data Parsing.
• Creación de interfaces de usuario adaptativas utilizando Constraint layouts.
• Comprensión de algoritmos, patrones de programación, estructuras de datos y programación funcional
• Idealmente conoces todos los productos involucrados en nuestro proceso CI/CD: JIRA, Stash, Git Flow, Nexus y Jenkins.
• Experiencia de desarrollo Android de manera profesional durante los últimos 3/4 años.
• Experiencia previa con Unit, Integration Test.

¡Formarás parte de un equipo al que le gusta trabajar bien pero pasarlo mejor!

El SlashTeam te está esperando.

jobs_results.title: Highly Skilled Android Developer Wanted
jobs_results.description:
At Solera Corporation, we are a leading provider of innovative digital identity and authentication solutions. Our mission is to empower individuals and organizations to navigate the digital world securely and efficiently.
• *Role Overview:**
We are seeking an experienced Senior Android Developer to join our technology team. As a critical member of our development team, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining advanced applications for the Android platform. Your key responsibilities include writing clean and efficient code, collaborating with cross-functional teams to define and design new features, troubleshooting and debugging to optimize performance, and ensuring the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications.
• *Key Responsibilities:**
• Develop and maintain Android applications using Java and Kotlin programming languages.
• Implement UI/UX designs provided by the design team.
• Collaborate with product owners to define project requirements and scope.
• Partner with designers to ensure the visual aspects align with the intended design.
• Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate RESTful APIs and other services.
• Troubleshoot and debug issues to enhance application performance.
• Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
• Omitimize applications for maximum security and scalability.
• Stay updated with the latest developments in the Android ecosystem.
• Explore new technologies and frameworks to improve development processes.
• Write unit and UI tests to identify malfunctions.
• Work with QA engineers to ensure comprehensive testing and quality assurance.
• Maintain detailed documentation for application development processes.
• *What You'll Bring:**
Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in Android development
Proficiency in Kotlin programming languages
Strong understanding of Android SDK and handling different screen sizes
Experience with RESTful APIs to connect Android applications to back-end services
Proficiency with Android Studio and version control systems, particularly Git
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
Strong communication and collaboration skills
Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work

The estimated annual salary for this position is around $120,000-$150,000 based on industry standards and location. We offer competitive benefits, including health insurance, retirement plans, and paid time off, to support your well-being and career growth.

jobs_results.title: Fullstack mobile developer with flutter
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an outstanding Mobile Developer with solid knowledge in Flutter to join our software engineering team for international projects. We offer a very friendly atmosphere for you to develop your skills as well as a competitive salary.

Knowledge, Skills & Experience Required

- BA/BSc in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related subject
- 2+ years of software development experience
- Flutter, Dart, Android Studio/ Visual Studio, Git Version Control
- Concurrency, RESTful, JSON & XML, MVC
- MVVM-C
- Push Notifications
- It is key that you are used to and have experience with Test
- Driven Development and Pairing
- Experience with Software Development & Project Management tools (CA Agile Central, Atlassian Jira)
- Source Code Management (GIT), CI/CD (Jenkins, Concourse)
- Analytics SDKs
- Unit testing Quick and Nimble
- Good analytical and problem-solving skills
- Strong oral and written communication skills in English
- Teamworker

Skills Preferred but not required

- Experience with iOS, Swift, SwiftUI, Objective-C, XCode
- Experience with Android, Kotlin, Java,
- Experience with React native
- German language skills

What we offer

- Full-time employment
- A great and motivated team of experts
- Innovative projects and great opportunities for further education
- Beautiful offices in a central location at 22@, Barcelona
- Good connection to public transport
- Variety of lunch offers in the neighborhood
- Good work-life balance and flexible working hours
- Free drinks (coffee, water, juices)
- Employee Benefits with Banco Sabadell
- Employee Benefits for further education byGrupoPlaneta
- Access to DATAGROUP SE corporate benefits program
- Remote work

About Almato

Almato is a 100% subsidiary of the listed DATAGROUP SE. The company is one of the leading providers of software and services for the intelligent digitalisation of companies. With Almato software, companies automate and mobilise their business processes. The applications include Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Digital Assistants, intelligent apps, ready-made software robots, machine learning services as well as complete solutions for individual tasks such as workforce management.

Companies from all industries use Almato´s software to reduce their costs and improve their service. Almato´s customers include Aida, Deichmann, Deutsche Telekom, H&M, Innogy, Lands End, Lidl,Sparda, Santander, and Tchibo.

Almato maintains partnerships as a value-added reseller with globally important technology providers such as Abbyy, Automation Anywhere, Nuance, SAP, and UiPath and employs more than 120 people at locations in Bonn, Duisburg, Hamburg, Reutlingen, Stuttgart, and Barcelona.

jobs_results.title: Senior Developer Mobile (IOS & Android)-Remoto
jobs_results.description:
This a Full Remote job, the offer is available from: Spain

En Grupo NS estamos incorporando diversos Senior Developer de tecnologías Mobile IOS y Android para proyectos remoto en clientes bancarios. Buscamos candidatos que residan en España, no se valorarán candidaturas de fuera del país.

Requisitos mínimos

Imprescindibles Perfil IOS:
• 3 años de experiencia continuada y especializada en desarrollo iOS nativo (No computan años de experiencia trabajados en tecnologías híbridas como React Native / Flutter / Xamarin, ni trayectorias en las que se indica desarrollo dual iOS/Android dado que no podemos determinar cuánto tiempo de dicha experiencia fue dedicado a iOS y cuál a Android. Similar para el caso de proyectos personales o experiencia como freelance, dado que, debido a la naturaleza del proyecto, es importante que hayan trabajado en equipo)
• Haber trabajado en estos proyectos como developer no solo resolver incidencias
• Haber trabajado con programación con vistas por código
• Idiomas: Castellano nativo o equivalente. Inglés B2 hablado, leído y escrito

Conocimientos Técnicos Necesarios:
• Tecnologías: Switf, Xcode, git
• UI: Conocimiento de UIKit, valorable de manera muy positiva SwiftUI
• Testing: Test unitarios: XCTest, Mocks e inyección de dependencias
• Arquitectura: conocimientos sobre arquitecturas MVVM, VIPER, etc
• Saber aplicar patrones CLEAN a la hora de resolver problemas
• Experiencia en Modularización en capas

Imprescindibles Perfil Android:
• Experiencia de, al menos, 4 años de experiencia exclusiva en desarrollo nativo de aplicaciones Android.
• Haber trabajado en proyectos formados por librerías o que publiquen SDKs como producto.
• Será imprescindible haber trabajado en proyectos que requiriesen accesibilidad.
• No se tomará en cuenta la experiencia laboral en tecnologías híbridas de desarrollo móvil como React Native, Flutter o Xamarin.
• No se considerará la experiencia en proyectos de desarrollo dual iOS/Android
• La experiencia en proyectos personales o como freelancer no se considerará a menos que haya sido llevado a cabo en un entorno de trabajo colaborativo.
• Idiomas: Español nativo, Inglés B2 o equivalente y valorable Portugués (BR),

Conocimientos Técnicos Necesarios:
• Dominio de Kotlin como lenguaje de programación.
• Amplio conocimiento de visibilidad y extensibilidad en Kotlin.
• Conocimiento de Flow y Coroutines.
• Sistemas de control de versiones, preferiblemente Git.
• Uso de herramientas de CI/CD: Bitrise (o similar: Github Workflow, Jenkins, ...)
• Metodologías ágiles de desarrollo.
• Flujo de trabajo de creación/revisión de PR y pruebas de control de calidad (QA).

Conocimientos Técnicos Deseables:
• Experiencia en el desarrollo de aplicaciones que cumplan con estándares de seguridad.
• Experiencia en Gradle como herramienta de configuración del proyecto: Version Catalogs para manejo de dependencias, compartición de lógica mediante Convention Plugins, manejo de scripts en Gradle, Android Gradle Plugin, creación de plugins para Gradle…
• Uso de herramientas de análisis y mejora de rendimiento en las Aplicaciones: Baseline profiles, Tracing…

Conocimientos Técnicos Extras:
• Familiaridad con librerías de procesado de anotaciones como KSP o herramientas de generación de código como Kotlin Poet.
• Experiencia en librerías de programación de tareas como WorkManager.
• Experiencia con librerías de control de Mapas: Google Maps
• Conocimientos extra de testing: TDD, Tests instrumentales…

This offer from "GRUPO NS" has been enriched by Jobgether.com and got a 73% flex score.

Si cumples con estos requisitos y te apasiona trabajar en un entorno dinámico y en crecimiento, ¡queremos saber de ti!

jobs_results.title: Lead Android Developer: Shape the Future of Digital Solutions
jobs_results.description:
Unlock a world of innovation and creativity as Meteor's Lead Android Developer. Join our team of experts in developing cutting-edge digital display solutions that redefine traditional screens.

About Us

At Meteor, we're dedicated to crafting seamless user experiences and harnessing the power of cutting-edge technology. Our collaborative environment fosters continuous learning, offering meaningful opportunities for team members to contribute directly to pioneering digital solutions.

About the Role

As our Lead Android Developer, you'll play a pivotal role in shaping the next generation of Android applications for our clients. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create robust, responsive, and high-standard applications. Build features from scratch and refine existing components to deliver exceptional user experiences.

Key Responsibilities
• Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions.
• Design client-side and server-side architecture.
• Build front-end applications through appealing visual design and attention to detail.
• Reuse components to maintain clear code.
• Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code.
• Test software for responsiveness and efficiency.
• Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade software.
• Create security and data protection settings.
• Develop features and applications with responsive design.
• Write technical documentation.
• Collaborate with data scientists and analysts to improve software.

Required Skills and Qualifications

Strong Technical Foundation
• Expertise in Android SDK, different versions of Android, and screen size management.
• Understanding of Android Porting and Build process.
• 5+ years of experience in Native app development.
• Experience with Video Processing, offline storage, threading, and performance tuning.
• Proficiency in Android SDK, Java, Kotlin, Jetpack components, SQLite Database, and MVVM Architecture.
• Ability to manage the full technical lifecycle of Android applications.

Nice-to-Have Qualifications
• Minimum 3 years of experience with Kotlin.
• FireTV/OTT application development expertise.
• Smart TV apps development experience.
• CI/CD pipelines and Server management knowledge.
• Multi-platform hybrid platform language proficiency.
• Backend language: NodeJS.

Benefits

Enjoy a competitive base salary of $4,000 - $6,000 depending on your experience and location. As a Full-time Contractor, you'll work remotely from Argentina (Work from home) with a schedule of Monday to Friday: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM.

Recruiting Process

Our comprehensive recruiting process includes:
• Application / Screening: Complete a short questionnaire and provide additional inputs to assess your qualifications.
• Skill Assessment: Complete exercises and/or projects designed to recreate work tasks for this role.
• Skill Assessment Interview: Participate in a 60-90 minute conversation to evaluate your skills and culture fit.
• Hiring Manager Final Interview: Engage in a 30-60 minute conversation to discuss expectations and vision for the role.

jobs_results.title: Administración
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits and will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications.

Responsibilities
• Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Work with outside data sources and API's.
• Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
• Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.

Requirements
• BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
• X+ years of software development experience
• X+ years of Android development
• Have published at least one original Android app
• Experience with Android SDK
• Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
• Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
• Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
• Solid understanding of the full mobile development life cycle.
